contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.blogpos.BlogPostPageShortDescription: Trying to keep your local test content from being deployed to other environments? Not sure how to leverage Xperince by Kentico's CI/CD object exclusions for Content items and Web Pages? Read on to learn a simple solution.
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.blogpos.BlogPostPageTitle: Excluding Content Items from Continuous Deployment using Global Events
